headline: Chris Pine Is A Ringer For His Icon Grandma! Tabs, Fri., April 1, 2022
author: Rebecca Schoenkopf
sentences: They knew Hurd would offer a set of solutions—the mass streamlining of legal immigration for both high-skilled workers and low-skilled laborers; the construction of a cutting-edge “virtual wall” utilizing cameras and fiber-optic cables to monitor illegal crossings; the granting of citizenship to millions of “Dreamers”; the surge of funding to local agencies dealing with a mass influx of asylum seekers—that would antagonize the loudest voices in both party bases.

(Ruling)
